title: Emerald Cascade Jhumka: A Symphony of Tradition and Elegance
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting gleam. Adorned with meticulously selected square-cut Emeralds (రత్నాలు) of exceptional clarity and dazzling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Finished with lustrous
features: These exquisite jhumkas feature a cascading design, reminiscent of blooming jasmine garlands (మల్లెపూల దండలు). The openwork floral motifs are intricately studded with CZ stones, highlighting the vivid green emeralds. The delicate pearl drops add a touch of timeless elegance and movement.
colors: The color palette is a harmonious blend of rich gold
and the soft ivory of the pearls
a classic South Indian combination that exudes opulence.
occasions: and festive celebrations. These jhumkas can elevate any outfit
from traditional sarees ( చీరలు) to contemporary ensembles. Ideal for special occasions like Seemantham (సీమంతం) or Half-Saree functions.
description: These jhumkas offer a captivating blend of traditional South Indian design and modern sensibility. The high-quality emeralds and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's brilliance, making these earrings a true statement piece.
